body: Igor Silva, who writes book reviews on his blog Lendo e Comentando [pt], recently disclosed a legal harassment attempt [pt] by a publisher that felt aggrieved over a negative review of one of its products. After the backlash, the publisher contacted Igor to apologize and said the employee responsible for the threat did not spoke for the company.
